import React, { useState } from 'react' import BookMenu from './BookMenu' function Book({book,updateBookStateInGrid}) { console.log("book : " + JSON.stringify(book)) const [bookCopy,setBook] = useState(bookCopy) updateBookState = (bookState)=>{ bookCopy['bookState'] = bookState; setBook(bookState) updateBookStateInGrid() } return (
{/* */}
{book.title}
{book.authors.map((author)=>

{author}

)}
) } export default Book
